name: Eternal Armada
description:
A 2D arcade pixel style action base defense shooter with a Retro-Futuristic Space setting on PC.

You the player, are an aspiring rookie space-fighter pilot for the United Earth Space Command attempting to work up the ranks. Unfortunately you've been sent to the far reaches of space to protect a listening station for any future expansion in the galaxy, you expect no action out here... When, out of the blue a fleet of heavily armed marauders attempt to take the listening station as a staging ground for an Invasion into United Space. It is YOUR job to stop them.

Key Features:

  • The game will feature a points system for score tracking
  • Hand made pixel art world !
  • Space Station that heals you
  • Customizable  fighters at your disposal
  • Increasing difficulty !
  • Special boss wave 

Future updates possibly planned depending on traction, just a prototype for now. Feel free to comment bugs, thoughts and ideas or email!
